## Risk Assessment

### Risks Mitigated

- âœ… Phase 2 parallel execution bottleneck (resolved with 24 agents)
- âœ… Single points of failure (multiple architects per domain)
- âœ… Lack of specialist expertise (8 dedicated domains)
- âœ… Quality concerns (dedicated QA team)
- âœ… Security gaps (full-time security team)

### New Risks Introduced

- ðŸŸ¡ Coordination overhead (30 agents vs 3)
  - **Mitigation**: Clear reporting lines, daily standups, async communication
- ðŸŸ¡ Communication complexity
  - **Mitigation**: Structured protocols, team leads, documentation
- ðŸŸ¡ Onboarding time (26 new agents)
  - **Mitigation**: 2-day structured onboarding, 4 training sessions

### Risk Level

- **Before expansion**: ðŸ”´ HIGH (Phase 2 impossible with 3 agents)
- **After expansion**: ðŸŸ¢ LOW (Manageable with proper structure)
